title: How to Set Up and Play Custom Maps on Rocket League

steps.title: Download the Workshop Textures.
steps.content: Download the Workshop Textures .

steps.title: Install Bakkes-Mod here.
steps.content: Install Bakkes-Mod here .

steps.title: Download Hamatchi or Port Forward.
steps.content: Download Hamatchi or Port Forward.

steps.title: Navigate to your CookedPCConsole.
steps.content: Navigate to your CookedPCConsole. While Rocket League is running, hit CTRL+SHIFT+ESC (Task Manager).

steps.title: Locate "Rocket League" in task manager and right-click it.
steps.content: Locate "Rocket League" in task manager and right-click it.

steps.title: Select "Open File-Location" or other variant in this menu.
steps.content: Select "Open File-Location" or other variant in this menu.

steps.title: Click on the up-arrow twice, or just click "rocketleague" in the folder address bar.
steps.content: Click on the up-arrow twice, or just click "rocketleague" in the folder address bar.

steps.title: Navigate into the TAGame directory.
steps.content: Navigate into the TAGame directory.

steps.title: Navigate into the CookedPCConsole directory.
steps.content: Navigate into the CookedPCConsole directory.

steps.title: Open the workshop-textures you have downloaded.
steps.content: Open the workshop-textures you have downloaded. This will be a .zip file.

steps.title: Copy and paste/extract the file contents into the CookedPCConsole directory.
steps.content: Copy and paste/extract the file contents into the CookedPCConsole directory.

steps.title: Install the Rocket Plugin.
steps.content: Install the Rocket Plugin. Press F2 to bring up the Bakkes-Mod menu while Rocket League is running.

steps.title: Click on the plugins tab.
steps.content: Click on the plugins tab.

steps.title: Click on Open Plugin Manager.
steps.content: Click on Open Plugin Manager.

steps.title: Type in the box "26" next to Install by ID.
steps.content: Type in the box "26" next to Install by ID.

steps.title: Click on Install by ID.
steps.content: Click on Install by ID.

steps.title: Navigate to the steam workshop for Rocket League in your web browser here.
steps.content: Navigate to the steam workshop for Rocket League in your web browser here .

steps.title: Navigate to steam workshop downloader website in your browser here.
steps.content: Navigate to steam workshop downloader website in your browser here .

steps.title: Copy the URL of the workshop map you wish to download and paste it into the bar on the workshop downloader.
steps.content: Copy the URL of the workshop map you wish to download and paste it into the bar on the workshop downloader.

steps.title: Click download.
steps.content: Click download.

steps.title: Place the downloaded map.
steps.content: Place the downloaded map. After downloading, navigate to your CookedPCConsole.

steps.title: Create a "mods" directory (folder) here, if you haven't already.
steps.content: Create a "mods" directory (folder) here, if you haven't already.

steps.title: Open the file you downloaded and copy the map file (*.udk).
steps.content: Open the file you downloaded and copy the map file (*.udk).

steps.title: Paste/drag/extract it into the CookedPCConsole/mods directory.
steps.content: Paste/drag/extract it into the CookedPCConsole/mods directory.

steps.title: Navigate to the steam workshop and just hit subscribe on the maps you want to play.
steps.content: Navigate to the steam workshop and just hit subscribe on the maps you want to play.

steps.title: Press F2 to bring up the Bakkes-Mod window.
steps.content: Press F2 to bring up the Bakkes-Mod window.

steps.title: Click the "plugins" tab.
steps.content: Click the "plugins" tab.

steps.title: Open the plugin.
steps.content: Open the plugin. On the left pane, click "Rocket Plugin" and "Open Rocket Plugin GUI" Use the right pane window when joining. Use the left pane window when hosting.

steps.title: Check the black-box to enable custom/workshop maps.
steps.content: Check the black-box to enable custom/workshop maps.

steps.title: Select the map and join/host respectively.
steps.content: Select the map and join/host respectively.
